    B

    BoardComponent - Class in gui.views.boardview
    Represents a Noticeboard in the GUI.
    BoardComponent(BoardView, NoticeboardDTO, boolean) - Constructor for class gui.views.boardview.BoardComponent
    Instantiates a new BoardComponent attached to a BoardView and linked to a Noticeboard.
    BoardSelector - Class in gui.views.boardview
    A utility GUI component, spawns a combo box attached to a BoardComponent in order to change the displayed Noticeboard.
    BoardSelector(BoardComponent, Dimension, boolean) - Constructor for class gui.views.boardview.BoardSelector
    Initializes a new BoardSelector bound to a BoardComponent.
    BoardView - Class in gui.views.boardview
    The BoardView, displays the logged User's Noticeboards and enables the user to add, modify and delete Noticeboards and their ToDos and to use the advanced ToDo search functions.
    BoardView() - Constructor for class gui.views.boardview.BoardView
    Instantiates a new BoardView.
